assessments.status_rationale: News notes a looming U.S. government shutdown but provides no confirmation of a shutdown starting on 2025-10-01 or ending by 2025-10-06.
No ISM Manufacturing Prices Index data for October 2025 is reported in today’s news; release is due by 2025-11-04.
No Census print for September 2025 New Home Sales is mentioned; release is due 2025-10-29.
JOLTS quits rate for August 2025 is scheduled for 2025-10-01; no figures appear in the news.
No report of VIX ≥ 25.00 in today’s coverage; deadline remains 2025-10-31.
No BTC price levels are cited; no confirmation of a close at or below $53,000.
No mention of the Brent–WTI spot spread levels; no evidence it reached ≥ $7.00.
No Henry Hub spot price figures are provided; no confirmation of ≤ $2.30.
Caixin China Services PMI for October 2025 is not yet released; no relevant data in the news.
Euro area core HICP (YoY, flash) for October 2025 is not covered; release due 2025-10-31.
No Boeing October 2025 delivery figures are reported; update expected by 2025-11-15.
No announcement of an EA acquisition or take-private at ≥ $50B appears in the news.
No reference to the 5-Year Breakeven Inflation Rate hitting ≥ 2.25%; no market data provided.
